aircraft.value: Wasp Interceptor - AC-5921-689 at Base Alpha

defect_observed.value: Fire control computer error. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Countermeasure Dispenser component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 28/12/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 29/12/2023 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 31/12/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 04/01/2024 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 07/01/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia
